name: scad-js
description: Generate OpenSCAD solid models with javascript
author: 20lives

scripts.dev: openscad dist/output.scad & nodemon --watch 'src/**' --ext 'ts' --exec 'yarn tsc && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node dist/index.js'
scripts.render: yarn tsc && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node dist/index.js && openscad out/output.scad -o out/output.stl
